txt.en: Goblins have settled in among the tombs of Haudh Narui.

'To the north lie the ruins of Haudh Nirui. My ancestors' ancestors rest there in ancient stone sarcophagi, but recently the tombs have been overrun by goblins. I implore you to do what you can to lessen their numbers, that the dead may sleep more soundly.'
You should let Taeras know that you have defeated goblins in Haudh Narui.\n\nTaeras is at Scurloc Farm.
Taeras has asked you to clear the tombs of Haudh Narui of goblins.\n\nHaudh Narui is located in north-eastern Cardolan.
'May those wretched creatures be driven from this land for good!'
